scripts.clean-db-test: npm run reset-test-db; npm run test
scripts.seed: knex seed:run --specific=user_accounts.js; knex seed:run --specific=bill_category.js; knex seed:run --specific=bill_items.js;
scripts.seed-test: NODE_ENV=test knex seed:run --specific=user_accounts.js; NODE_ENV=test knex seed:run --specific=bill_category.js; NODE_ENV=test knex seed:run --specific=bill_items.js;
scripts.db-test: npm run reset-test-db; npm run test
scripts.reset-db: npm run make-db; npm run migrate; npm run seed
scripts.reset-test-db: NODE_ENV=test npm run make-test-db; npm run migrate -- --env=test; npm run seed-test
scripts.reset-db2: npm run make-db2; npm run migrate; npm run seed
scripts.db-test2: npm run reset-test-db2; npm run test
scripts.reset-test-db2: NODE_ENV=test npm run make-test-db2; npm run migrate -- --env=test; npm run seed-test
scripts.make-db2: dropdb -U postgres monthly-bills; createdb -U postgres monthly-bills
scripts.make-test-db2: dropdb -U postgres monthly-bills-test; createdb -U postgres monthly-bills-test
